text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Savings bank" means an institution that:
Is incorporated under the laws of this State as a savings bank; and
Engages only in the business of savings banking.
The term "savings bank" includes a subsidiary savings bank for the purpose of applying the provisions of this article.

text.section: "Mutual holding company" means the corporation which holds more than 50% of the stock of a subsidiary savings bank pursuant to a reorganization under Subtitle 8 of this title.
